Text: this is nuked it goes out of sync at 60 min. until end of the movie but if you have vlc or mkvmerge you can fix that easily
Indeed, NUKED. Not sure exactly how (noticeably) out-of-sync the final mintures are, though.

Does go out of sync at 60 mins.
Watch on a PC watch with VLC Media Player. To adjust audio (when it goes out of sync) Select >Tools >Track Synchronization Then adjust Audio/Video to -3.000s Then resume play.

@AKD73   Thanx Alot For Instruction.....

Movie Was Awesome....
